com.cloudpos.pinpad

Interface PINPadDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Device

    public interface PINPadDevice
extends Device
    The PINPadDevice interface defines the PINPad APIs to be used by the applications.

    The PINPad device object is obtained from the POSTerminal, its' as follows: 

     PINPadDevice pinPadDevice =
         (PINPadDevice) POSTerminal.getInstance().getDevice("cloudpos.device.pinpad");
    Among them, the "cloudpos.device.pinpad" string is to identify the PINPad device, defined by the specific implementation.

    Uses the PINPad device object to control the operation of the PINPad device.

    An app can request permission to access the device, as shown below:

    1. <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CLOUDPOS_PIN_GET_PIN_BLOCK"/> uses this permission, can call listenForPinBlock(KeyInfo, String, boolean, OperationListener, int) and waitForPinBlock(KeyInfo, String, boolean, int).
    2. <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CLOUDPOS_PIN_MAC"/> uses this permission, can call calculateMac(KeyInfo, int, byte[]).
    3. <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CLOUDPOS_PIN_ENCRYPT_DATA"/>. uses this permission, can call encryptData(KeyInfo, byte[]).
    4. <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CLOUDPOS_PIN_UPDATE_USER_KEY"/>. uses this permission, can call updateUserKey(int, int, byte[],int, byte[]) and updateUserKey(int, int, byte[]).
    See Also:

      • updateUserKey

        void updateUserKey(int masterKeyID,
                 int userKeyID,
                 byte[] cipherNewUserKey,
                 int checkType,
                 byte[] checkValue)
                   throws DeviceException
        Updates the user key(session key). The buffer is the cipher user key which encrypted by master key. Using 3DES algorithm.
        Parameters:
        masterKeyID - Master key index.
        userKeyID - User key type.
        cipherNewUserKey - Cipher new user key.
        checkType - check value type:CHECK_TYPE_NONE, CHECK_TYPE_CUP.
        checkValue - check value.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.

      • listenForPinBlock

        void listenForPinBlock(KeyInfo keyInfo,
                     java.lang.String pan,
                     boolean voicePrompt,
                     OperationListener listener,
                     int timeout)
                       throws DeviceException
        Let the user input the PIN and calculate the encrypted pin block. This method is asynchronous and results in an PINPadOperationResult sent to the handleResult method of the OperationListener. Because this method uses a timeout parameter, the device receiving this request MUST be able to successfully respond to cancelRequest() and abort the operation.

        In case of a timeout occurring, the operation result will contain code= ERR_TIMEOUT, and no information about pin block will be available.

        Parameters:
        keyInfo - The key configuration that used by the PINPad calculate.
        pan - the ASCII string of the card number.
        voicePrompt - play the audio to notice user.
        listener - The operation listener.
        timeout - the maximum pending time of the method, in milliseconds. Note that the timeout will begin when the request begins to be processed. The timeout parameter is then only indicative. There are two special cases for timeout, as follows:
        • If timeout == FOREVER, the method will wait until something is available on the associated service's input.
        • If timeout == IMMEDIATE, the method will immediately read the input
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.

      • waitForPinBlock

        PINPadOperationResult waitForPinBlock(KeyInfo keyInfo,
                                    java.lang.String pan,
                                    boolean voicePrompt,
                                    int timeout)
                                      throws DeviceException
        The synchronous method of listenForPinBlock(KeyInfo,String,boolean,OperationListener,int).

        Parameters:
        keyInfo - The key configuration that used by the PINPad calculate.
        pan - the ASCII string of the card number.
        voicePrompt - play the audio to notice user.
        timeout - the maximum pending time of the method, in milliseconds. Note that the timeout will begin when the request begins to be processed. The timeout parameter is then only indicative. There are two special cases for timeout, as follows:
        • If timeout == FOREVER, the method will wait until something is available on the associated service's input.
        • If timeout == IMMEDIATE, the method will immediately read the input
        Returns:
        cipher PIN block.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.

      • listenForOfflinePin

        void listenForOfflinePin(boolean voicePrompt,
                       OperationListener listener,
                       int timeout)
                         throws DeviceException
        Let the user to wait the offline pin. the method will not return the pin to the app, only to notify the result of the input.
        Parameters:
        voicePrompt - play the audio to notice user.
        listener - The operation listener.
        timeout - the maximum pending time of the method, in milliseconds. Note that the timeout will begin when the request begins to be processed. The timeout parameter is then only indicative. There are two special cases for timeout, as follows:
        • If timeout == FOREVER, the method will wait until something is available on the associated service's input.
        • If timeout == IMMEDIATE, the method will immediately read the input
        Throws:
        DeviceException

      • calculateMac

        byte[] calculateMac(KeyInfo keyInfo,
                  int macFlag,
                  byte[] plain)
                    throws DeviceException
        Calculates the MAC using current user key defined in KeyInfo.
        Parameters:
        keyInfo - The key configuration that used by the PINPad calculate.
        macFlag - the constants as follows:
        1. AlgorithmConstants.ALG_MAC_METHOD_ECB.
        2. AlgorithmConstants.ALG_MAC_METHOD_X99.
        plain - plain data buffer.
        Returns:
        MAC data buffer.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.

      • updateUserKeyWithCheck

        void updateUserKeyWithCheck(int masterKeyID,
                          int userKeyID,
                          byte[] cipherNewUserKey,
                          int userKeyType,
                          byte[] checkValue,
                          int algoCheckValue)
                            throws DeviceException
        Updates the user key(session key). The buffer is the cipher user key which encrypted by master key. Assign the check value and the algorithm of the check value.
        Parameters:
        masterKeyID - index of master key
        userKeyID - index of user key
        cipherNewUserKey - ciphered user key
        userKeyType - user key type. 0--PIN key;1--MAC key;2—Data key
        checkValue - check value of user key
        algoCheckValue - ALGO_CHECK_VALUE 0--ALGO_CHECK_VALUE_DEFAULT;1--ALGO_CHECK_VALUE_SE919
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.

      • updateMasterKeyWithCheck

        void updateMasterKeyWithCheck(int masterKeyID,
                            byte[] cipherNewMasterKey,
                            byte[] checkValue,
                            int algoCheckValue)
                              throws DeviceException
        Updates master key, the master key must be ciphered by transport key.
        Parameters:
        masterKeyID - index of master key
        cipherNewMasterKey - ciphed master key
        checkValue - check value
        algoCheckValue - ALGO_CHECK_VALUE 0--ALGO_CHECK_VALUE_DEFAULT;1--ALGO_CHECK_VALUE_SE919
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.

      • encryptData

        byte[] encryptData(KeyInfo keyInfo,
                 byte[] plain,
                 int mode,
                 byte[] IV,
                 int IVLen)
                   throws DeviceException
        Encrypts the data using user key defined in KeyInfo
        Parameters:
        keyInfo -
        plain - plain data buffer
        mode - 0--PINPAD_ENCRYPT_STRING_MODE_EBC；1--PINPAD_ENCRYPT_STRING_MODE_CBC；2--PINPAD_ENCRYPT_STRING_MODE_CFB；3--PINPAD_ENCRYPT_STRING_MODE_OFB，Padding使用的是NoPadding.
        IV - initial vector
        IVLen - length of initial vector
        Returns:
        cipher data buffer.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.
